payload.description: As a developer working in a Kanbus project, I want the extension to activate automatically so that I can open the board without manual setup.  Acceptance Criteria (BDD):  Scenario: Extension activates when .kanbus.yml is present   Given a VSCode workspace containing a .kanbus.yml file   When VSCode opens the workspace   Then the extension activates   And the command 'Kanbus: Open Board' appears in the command palette  Scenario: Extension stays dormant in non-Kanbus workspaces   Given a VSCode workspace with no .kanbus.yml file   When VSCode opens the workspace   Then the extension does not activate   And 'Kanbus: Open Board' does not appear in the command palette  Implementation: Create apps/vscode/ with package.json (activationEvents: workspaceContains:.kanbus.yml), tsconfig.json, and src/extension.ts entry point registering the kanbus.openBoard command.
payload.title: Extension activates in Kanbus projects
